description: Bagna cauda is a classic Italian anchovy dip, delicious scooped up with bread or crisp vegetable crudites as an entree.
keywords: Crudit√©,Pescatarian,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Bagna Cauda with Rainbow Veg Dippers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large carrots, peeled and chopped into batons
2 large capsicums, red and yellow, finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan on low heat, gently heat the oil with the garlic and anchovies for 2-3 minutes.
Whisk in 100g of butter, cooking until melted and incorporated. Remove from the heat and stir in the rest of the butter.
Serve in a bowl surrounded by vegetable dippers.
